Title: Fearful Pranks Ensue
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Jennifer Salt
Actors: Sarah Paulson, Taissa Farmiga, Frances Conroy, Evan Peters
Plot: Fiona's choices rattle a decades-long truce between the Salem witches and Marie Laveau. The Council of Witchcraft pays a surprise visit to the Academy with disturbing allegations.
